articles.title: You Have To Respect The ASUS ROG Phone 5’s Commitment To The Bit - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Some phones try to cater to all users. ASUS's ROG Phone 5 has no interest in that: it is a phone for gaming, first and foremost.
